title: Ruckus in Legislative Council as Tirumala laddu row reaches a flashpoint

title: Bengaluru-Delhi-Bengaluru is Akasa Air’s most popular pet route

title: Illegal roadside shops in Munnar cause traffic jams and wildlife conflicts

title: Watch: What is Pax Silica?

Pax Silica is aimed at protecting technology supply chains from strategic vulnerabilities — particularly amid concerns over China’s dominance in critical sectors.

title: 'Not a negotiated document': India clarifies on signing UN statement condemning Israel
content: ​​India was among more than 100 countries and international organisations that condemned Israel's ongoing efforts to consolidate control over the West Bank in a joint statement at the UN, saying such measures violated international law and undermined the ongoing efforts for peace and stability in the region. India endorsed the statement late on Wednesday, just before the deadline for joint condemnation lapsed.

title: Missile swarms & drone hordes: Why US should think twice before attacking Iran
content: The US has significantly boosted its military presence in the Gulf with two aircraft carrier strike groups and advanced stealth fighters, citing tensions with Iran over its nuclear program and regional stability. This build-up, including reinforced missile defense systems, aims to secure the vital Strait of Hormuz, a key global energy corridor.

title: ‘James Bond-style’ bunker: Why a crypto firm is buying more gold than most central banks
content: Crypto giant Tether is now a leading gold buyer, acquiring nearly two tonnes weekly, surpassing many nations. This move, driven by its tokenized gold product and diversification strategy, sees the company amassing significant bullion reserves. Tether's substantial gold purchases are reshaping global demand, with its holdings now rivaling central bank levels.

title: Abhishek Sharma to get dropped? India coach makes fresh admission amid poor form
content: India opener Abhishek Sharma has struggled in the T20 World Cup with three ducks, but the team management continues to back him. Coach Morne Morkel said there is no talk of dropping him. Sunil Gavaskar feels pressure is affecting his game and advised him to build innings patiently. Assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate said Abhishek showed good form in the nets and should bounce back in the Super 8s.

title: Bernie Sanders backs Bill that made Google founders leave Silicon Valley
content: Senator Bernie Sanders rallied in Los Angeles, advocating for a proposed California tax on billionaires to fund essential services amid rising living costs. The initiative, a one-time 5% tax on net worth over $1 billion, faces opposition from Governor Newsom and business groups who warn of potential departures and economic impact.

title: Pak hockey in turmoil: Federation bans captain, then revokes after PHF chief resigns
content: Pakistan's government has overturned a two-year ban on national hockey captain Ammad Shakeel Butt, deeming the action by the former PHF president "illegal and unconstitutional." The ban followed Butt's criticism of federation mismanagement during a disastrous Australia tour, where players faced poor accommodation and unpaid allowances. The Prime Minister's appointee reversed the ban, aiming to repair damage to Pakistan hockey.

title: Blood & Bishnoi links: Arrest of ‘Madam Zeher’ opens can of worms in Delhi’s drug underworld
content: Delhi Police arrested Khusnuma Ansari, alias Neha, a beauty parlour owner allegedly managing a drug network for the Lawrence Bishnoi gang. Her arrest highlights a trend of women playing key roles in Delhi-NCR crime.  Recent cases include Zikra, arrested for instigating a murder, and Kajal Khatri, a 'lady don' allegedly running a gang's operations.

title: 'Topless, brainless & shameless': BJP slams Cong's 'despicable' act at AI summit, guns for Rahul
content: BJP has accused the Congress of disrupting the AI Impact Summit to damage India's global image, alleging the protest was directed by Rahul Gandhi. Youth Congress workers staged a demonstration, raising slogans against the Prime Minister, leading to detentions. BJP leaders condemned the act as an attempt to embarrass India on the world stage.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman calls out tech companies for mass layoffs
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman criticizes companies for 'AI washing' – falsely blaming AI for layoffs driven by cost-cutting. While genuine job displacement by AI is coming, many firms use it as a narrative shield for over-hiring or restructuring. High-profile companies have even walked back AI-centric layoff claims, revealing more mundane reasons.

title: 'Angry youth won't stay silent': Congress defends shirtless protest at AI summit
content: The Indian Youth Congress staged a shirtless protest at the AI Summit, calling the Prime Minister "compromised" and highlighting the anger of unemployed youth. The group stated their demonstration was against perceived compromises on national interests. The protest drew sharp criticism from the BJP, accusing the Congress of attempting to humiliate India.

title: India gets first WIM from Northeast: The story of 15-year-old Arshiya Das
content: Tripura’s 15-year-old chess prodigy Arshiya Das recently became the first Woman International Master (WIM) from Northeast India after winning a tournament in Serbia. Her rise began from playing chess on a laptop as a child, followed by strong national and international results. With family sacrifices, coaching across India, and intense training, she has emerged as a major talent, highlighting both the region’s potential and the need for better support and sponsorship

title: OpenAI to raise $100bn, but Nvidia may not pay it the ‘promised’ $100bn
content: OpenAI is reportedly raising over $100 billion, with Nvidia now set to invest $30 billion for equity, scaling back from a previous $100 billion partnership. This shift occurs amid investor concerns about an AI bubble, though both companies reaffirm their strong working relationship and OpenAI's significant computing needs.

title: Raquel Rodriguez challenges Cardi B and Megan Thee Stallion to WrestleMania
content: Raquel Rodriguez has challenged Cardi B and Megan Thee Stallion to a WWE tag team match at WrestleMania. Speaking on TMZ’s Inside The Ring, Rodriguez said she and Liv Morgan have wanted this match since 2023. While no match is confirmed, WWE’s history with celebrity crossovers makes the idea possible and exciting for fans.

title: India to buy oil from Venezuela? What MEA & US envoy Gor said
content: India is diversifying its oil sources, according to US envoy Sergio Gor. Discussions are underway for Venezuelan oil imports. The US maintains its stance against countries buying Russian oil. A trade deal between India and the US is nearing finalization, with a potential meeting between Prime Minister Modi and US President Trump anticipated.

title: From Bill Gates to former prince Andrew: The biggest names felled by Epstein files
content: In most cases, the documents do not accuse those named of participating in Epstein’s crimes. The consequences have instead flowed from the visibility of continued contact, personal familiarity, or financial links that became publicly indefensible once exposed.

title: Congress paradox: Shashi Tharoor praises AI Summit, youth leaders protest on spot
content: Youth Congress workers staged a shirtless protest against a trade deal at the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi, leading to their detention. This occurred hours after Congress MP Shashi Tharoor praised the summit's organization and global stature, and also supported a defense deal with France.

title: 'Scheduling not in domain', say New Zealand ahead of Super 8 clash vs Pakistan
content: Unfazed by scheduling quirks, venue changes, or unfamiliar conditions, New Zealand stick to their no-nonsense approach heading into the Super Eight. Mark Chapman’s calm responses reflect a team focused on clarity, adaptability, and execution as they prepare to tackle spin-heavy Pakistan on slower Colombo surfaces.

title: Gurgaon horror: 3.5-year-old raped, strangled to death by neighbour
content: A 3.5-year-old girl was raped and strangled to death in Gurgaon after being lured away by a neighbour. The 25-year-old accused, a native of Bihar, confessed to the crime during police interrogation. He admitted to taking the child to an empty place and then killing her to destroy evidence.

title: Afridi issues fiery challenge to Shadab over 'India World Cup' comment
content: Former Pakistan captain Shahid Afridi has criticized Shadab Khan's post-match comments, reminding him of the challenges of handling success after their 2021 World Cup win against India. Afridi urged Shadab to let his performance on the field answer critics during the upcoming Super 8 matches, emphasizing that former players supported him during difficult times.

title: Why former Prince Andrew and ex-wife lived together after divorce
content: Sarah Ferguson, once Prince Andrew's devoted ex-wife, is reportedly distancing herself following the Epstein scandal and King Charles's actions.  Despite decades of cohabitation and unwavering support, recent revelations and title stripping have prompted Fergie to seek her own path, prioritizing self-preservation amidst mounting pressure and a need to rebuild her life.

title: Rajasthan MLA compares BJP budget to ‘son’, Congress's budget to ‘daughter’, row erupts
content: Women's rights groups have demanded action against BJP MLA Bahadur Singh Koli for his remarks in the Rajasthan Assembly. Koli compared the current BJP government's budgets to "having a son" and previous Congress budgets to "having a daughter," deeming the former productive and the latter responsible for the Congress's defeat. The organizations condemned the analogy as patriarchal and regressive.

title: 'You're my best gift this year': Mahieka reacts to Hardik's birthday post
content: Cricketer Hardik Pandya celebrated his girlfriend Mahieka Sharma's 25th birthday with a heartfelt Instagram post featuring a video of them enjoying fireworks and releasing a lantern. Pandya expressed his love and gratitude, to which Sharma responded by calling him her best gift. The couple has been publicly seen together since Pandya confirmed their relationship in October 2025.

title: 57-year-old Sikh man kidnapped from California gurdwara
content: A Sikh man was allegedly kidnapped from a gurdwara in Tracy, California. Avtar Singh, a cook at the gurdwara Guru Nanak Parkash, was seen entering a white SUV with three unidentified individuals. The San Joaquin County Sheriff's Office is investigating the incident. Surveillance footage shows the victim entering the vehicle against his will.

title: Why rights exist but justice remains out of reach for the poor
content: Millions in India eligible for free legal aid remain unaware or distrustful, hindering access to justice. Poverty creates legal vulnerability, preventing the poor from asserting their rights due to hidden costs like lost wages and travel. Despite a comprehensive framework, structural issues like low awareness and funding misuse persist, leaving constitutional promises unfulfilled for the most vulnerable.

title: Ambulance stuck in traffic jam as youths cut cake, burst crackers on highway for birthday bash
content: Youths disrupted traffic on the Ambikapur–Banaras highway in Surguja district to celebrate a birthday, causing a kilometer-long jam and stranding vehicles, including an ambulance, for half an hour.  Videos of fireworks and cake cutting on a car bonnet went viral, prompting police to register a case against unidentified individuals.

title: Canada-based gangster boasts he had sarpanch killed at Punjab wedding
content: Police are investigating the murder of AAP sarpanch Harbinder Singh, shot dead at a wedding in Tarn Taran. Fugitive gangster Lakhbir Landa claimed responsibility on social media, citing revenge for alleged harm to his associate. Authorities have detained several suspects and are exploring multiple leads, while political figures decry the state of law and order.

title: UP authorities bulldoze barber shop after ‘sexual assault’ on 8-year-old girl sparks protests
content: Authorities in Lakhimpur Kheri demolished a barber shop. This action followed protests demanding strict action against the 22-year-old owner. He is accused of raping an eight-year-old girl. Officials stated the shop was built on encroached land. The demolition occurred amid widespread public outcry over the sexual assault case. The accused has been arrested and the girl is stable.

title: 'Congress left borders open': Shah raises infiltration pitch in poll-bound Assam
content: Union home minister Amit Shah accused the Congress of leaving Assam's borders open to infiltrators, aiming to alter the state's demographics. He contrasted this with the BJP government's efforts under CM Himanta Biswa Sarma, who he stated cleared vast lands occupied by infiltrators. Shah also highlighted the BJP's infrastructure development achievements in Assam.

title: 65-year-old umpire dies in bee attack during cricket match in Uttar Pradesh
content: A senior umpire, Manik Gupta, has died after a bee swarm attacked a cricket match in Shuklaganj Unnao. Gupta, 65, was stung multiple times during a KDMA league game. He was taken to several hospitals before being declared dead. Gupta had served on the KCA umpiring panel for 30 years.

title: ‘Mission failure’: Nasa’s harsh verdict on Sunita Williams’ Starliner mission
content: NASA has classified Boeing's Starliner mission as a "Type A mishap" following a troubled 2024 flight that left astronauts stranded for months. The agency cited technical flaws and management shortcomings, emphasizing leadership accountability and the need for corrective actions before future flights. NASA acknowledged its own role in accepting the vehicle and launching the crew.

title: Infosys-Anthropic collaboration: A game-changer for IT sector?
content: Contrary to initial fears, India's IT services sector is poised to benefit from AI advancements, a Jefferies report suggests.  Instead of job losses, companies are seeing increased demand for customized AI solutions built on proprietary data. This shift widens the industry's market, potentially easing economic concerns and boosting valuations.

title: Total Lunar Eclipse: When is Chandra Grahan? Check date, time & significance
content: Sky watchers in India can witness the first Chandra Grahan of 2026 on March 3rd. This total lunar eclipse will be visible from India. The Moon will turn red, creating a Blood Moon. The visible phase begins around 6:26 PM. People can observe this celestial event with the naked eye. Binoculars or telescopes can enhance the view.

title: Unexplained skin changes? Here are 5 signs that maybe liver-related
content: Your skin can reveal hidden liver issues long before blood tests. Experts highlight signs like persistent itching, unexplained yellowing of skin and eyes (jaundice), spider-like red veins, darkening in skin folds, and easy bruising. These changes, often dismissed, signal the liver's struggle. Early detection through lifestyle changes and tests is crucial.

title: Delhi HC asks Kuldeep Singh Sengar's brother Jaideep to surrender in Unnao case
content: The Delhi High Court has ordered Jaideep Sengar, brother of Unnao rape case convict Kuldeep Sengar, to surrender before jail authorities in connection with his conviction in the custodial death case of the survivor's father.

title: 'It is the best time to crush': Oman captain fires up team against struggling Australia
content: Oman captain Jatinder Singh expressed confidence ahead of their final T20 World Cup clash against a struggling Australia. Despite both teams being eliminated, Singh believes T20 cricket is about momentum and seizing key moments, aiming to capitalize on Australia's current form. The Omani squad remains positive and determined to make their mark in their last match.

title: Himachal Pradesh raises entry tax; pvt cars to pay Rs 170 now
content: Himachal Pradesh is increasing vehicle entry fees significantly from April 1st to boost state finances. Private cars will now pay Rs 170, up from Rs 70, while commercial buses face a Rs 600 charge. The government will also implement FASTag and online barrier auctions to improve efficiency at key entry points.

title: Salman Khan visits father Salim Khan in hospital, urges docs to maintain privacy
content: Salman Khan visited Mumbai’s Lilavati Hospital to see his ailing father Salim Khan on ventilator support after a minor brain haemorrhage. He paused 'Battle of Galwan' shoot. Salman urged doctors to keep health private, upset over public updates. Family seeks privacy amid speculation.

title: India-US trade deal operational soon! Other FTAs will follow, here's what Union minister Goyal said
content: India is set to implement new trade agreements with the United States, the United Kingdom, and Oman in the coming months. An interim deal with the US is expected to be formalized in March and come into effect in April. This pact will see reciprocal tariffs reduced.

title: How Premier League clubs look to U.S. to fund big-money signings
content: Gab Marcotti looks at the reasons why premier league clubs were able to pass the £3 billion mark in transfer spending in the summer window . from next season, the league will switch from Profit and Sustainability Rules (PSR) to Squad Cost Ratio (SCR) regulations, marking the latest shift in english soccer's financial landscape .

title: Top moments: United States wins gold medal game over Canada in overtime
content: Emily Kaplan looks ahead to the U.S. women's hockey team's gold medal game against Canada. (0:43) It all came down to this at the 2026 Olympic Games for the two most dominant countries in international women's hockey. The United States and Canada faced off Thursday for the gold medal. After a thrilling back-and-forth game, the U.S. won 2-1 in overtime on a goal by Megan Keller. Women's ice hockey was first introduced at the Olympics in 1998, and these are the only two countries to have won Olympic gold since. Canada won gold four years ago in Beijing, but the U.S. swept this winter's Rivalry Series and defeated Canada 5-0 in the preliminary round. More:   U.S.-Canada is the rematch everyone wanted   |  U.S. favored in gold medal game Here are all the goals and top moments from the game.

title: How Eileen Gu competing for China is all American
content: the 22-year-old is a sensation in china and a cultural touchstone in the united states . she has made tens of millions off corporations in both countries desperate to be linked to her . a certain beer company might label her the most interesting woman in the world . her fiercest critics might concede to her to her fierceest critics .

title: NCAA men's hockey bubble watch: Who should make the field -- and who will sweat it out
content: six automatic bids to the NCAA tournament will be awarded to the winners of the six conference tournaments . ten more teams will earn at-large spots determined by the NPI formula . the four regional brackets will be announced March 22 .

title: Why the U.S. women won 2026 Olympic gold over Canada -- and an updated state of the rivalry
content: the 2026 Olympic women's hockey tournament ended in as epic a fashion as anyone could have imagined . the united states tied the score with just over two minutes remaining to send the game to overtime on a goal by Hilary Knight . how did the game play out for both sides?

title: The future is bright for Olympic gold medal winning U.S. women's hockey
content: the 2026 u.s. women's hockey team is the best team she's ever played on . she has won six world championship medals, three gold, three silver . the 31-year-old is now a two-time Olympian .

title: 2026 MLB draft rankings 1.0: Which college star is No. 1 on our list?
content: college players were ranked using the FV (future value) system that I applied for pro prospects . this is the first time we've seen college players in action over the first week of the season . it's time for our first look at who could be high on draft boards in July .

title: How did a West Texas oilman make Team USA's Olympic bobsled team?
content: boone Niederhofer was going to need to do everything necessary to make the 2026 bobsled team . but most everything in his path to that point was atypical, Schwarz said . in 2014, he caught 29 passes for 293 yards and a touchdown .

title: 2026 Winter Olympics: U.S. men's hockey faces Slovakia in semis and more
content: no. 3 seed dominated germany 6-2 to advance to the men's freeski halfpipe final . team USA will face Slovakia in the semifinals after hanging on to defeat Sweden in overtime on Wednesday . americans Nick Goepper and Alex Ferreira will compete for gold .
